issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.

fields.summary: Timestamps with timezone are set to null when using the streaming API

comments.body:
LGTM - +1

The 2nd patch removed the streaming test?
I thought it was enough TestTimestampParser.java but there may be value in it.
Heh, the parser test tests your fix and the other tests tests for the bug.
